com.adeptions.clarguments

Class ArgumentDefinitions

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.adeptions.clarguments.ArgumentDefinitions
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Iterable<ArgumentDefinition>

    public class ArgumentDefinitions
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Iterable<ArgumentDefinition>
    Represents a list of argument definitions and provides methods for parsing args
